text: Hausa (; Harshen/Halshen Hausa) is a Chadic language. It was first spoken in Southern Niger and Northern Nigeria. Now many other people in West Africa speak it. It is the most widely spoken Chadic language, with around 47 million people speaking it as a first language. ==References== Category:West Chadic languages Category:Languages of Niger Category:Languages of Nigeria
title: Hausa language
